summary: A letter from Roger Joyce of the Community of Nations Fund to Miguel A. Diaz Isalgue, offering him a position to study the effects of large-scale migration in Miami, Florida, at a rate of $250.00 per month, commencing March 1st, 1963.
summary_one_paragraph: On February 20, 1963, Roger Joyce of the Community of Nations Fund wrote to Miguel A. Diaz Isalgue, offering him a job at $250 per month to study the effects of large-scale migration on communities, specifically focusing on the unique situation in Miami due to the influx of Cuban countrymen. The position involves spending time in the New York offices and traveling, with the study expected to begin on March 1st.
title: Employment Offer for Migration Study
